tridonic.connecdim.webapi

Class connecdim

  • java.lang.Object
    • tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdim

  • public class connecdim
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class to securely access the connecdim cloud with your account at https://api.connecdim.com/
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaie Demaagd

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      connecdim()
      Creates a blank connecdim without username or password information
      connecdim(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Constructs the class using the username and password supplied for authentication

                             int linenumber)

        Parameters:
        gateway - the macaddress of the gateway
        linenumber - the gateway line number from 1-4
